Dead by Daylight is a very good game but has many black spots.

----------------------------------------------------------------

For those who don't really know this game, I'll give you a very quick description.

It's a 4 vs 1 game: 4 survivors against one killer. Each survivor and killer has unique abilities called "perks". You can acquire these perks from other survivors and killers at a certain level. You can also acquire items and offerings to help you. Your goal in this game as a survivor is to make 5 generators that will open two large doors to escape. As a killer, is to stop and kill before they can escape. 

When you catch a survivor, you won't be able to kill them (except in some very specific cases), you will have to hook them 3x to kill them completely. 2x if the survivor struggles and passes phase 2 by itself. During this time, the other survivors can try to unhook it in order to continue the game. During the first phase, the hooked survivor can try to unhook himself but, after several tries, he will go to phase 2 where he will have to struggle to avoid the hook piercing him and killing him directly.

When there is a survivor left, a "trap door" appears somewhere and opens to allow the survivor alone to have the choice of exiting through one of the doors or the trap door. The more generators are made, the less survivors there are, the trap door may appear but will remain closed until the last survivor or if you have an item to open it. 

You can calculate the appearance of the trapdoor as follows: There must be the number of survivors left + 1 in the fact generators. Example:

4 survivors + 1 -> 5 generators must be made 
3 survivors + 1 -> 4 generators must be made 
2 survivors + 1 -> 3 generators must be made 

1 survivor => the trap door has appeared automatically and is open.

That's roughly the gameplay, now my opinion on it.

----------------------------------------------------------------

- DBD is a very good game and offers rich characters whether in killer or survivor. Much more technical than you might think, coordination is the best solution in this game and if you manage to go with one or more friends, you can make epic games.

- The soundtrack and the level-design in general are very good, even excellent.

- The fact that you can get outfits and survivors/killers for free is nice.

And unfortunately, this is the only good thing... The negative points are numerous:

- With each new chapter, you don't have to wait long to run into cheaters whether on the survivor or killer side, completely ruining the game.

- Bugs that are not yet fixed and that have been put on the DbD forum to show those famous bugs like staying crouched after being healed and never getting up... Even the killer can't unlock you...

- Despite a rating system of player or the game in general, the developers decide not to get involved and seems to completely ignore this system that speaks of concerns encountered in game (cheats, bugs, bad behavior, etc.)

- A big problem with matchmaking! Are you new? Well, welcome to the survivors and killers who are already here before you and who know how to play better than you... Come on, we'll show you how to suffer! When you are rank 20 (new player) and you fall on ranks 10-15 (veteran you could say) or even ranks below 10 (semi-pro)

So I know that there are people who make games where they lose to go up in the ranks and attack new players but, it would be nice if they settle this major case anyway... That new players don't almost always run into people who know how to play and vice versa.

- The team prefers to add new outfits, skins and new survivors and killers instead of fixing the major issues in the game... I'd rather they focus a bit more on the more important issues than adding killers and survivors.

- The hitbox/lag needs to be reworked, you can explain to me how a killer manages to hit you if you go through a window well before him... Or that he grabs you through the window while the animation display shows an invisible arm grabbing you before being "teleported" into the killer's arms... When you swing a paddle to protect yourself from a killer but the latter either manages to hit you despite you being on the other side of the paddle or the paddle refuses to fall despite you hammering your key to...

-----------------------------------------

Final Word: DbD is a very good game, which can be frustrating and fun. It will be fun for one game, two or three games sometimes more if you come across good games. But don't expect a bug free game, there are bugs, problems and sometimes, even too often, you can find cheats.

Despite the many negative points, I still recommend it although I wish I could change my opinion and not list all the problems it has now.

And despite that, after many moments on it, I can't get enough of it. It's a good little game to have fun with friends, to rave about. What is a pity is the team that decides to offer new content and not fix the bugs.

So, play DbD but don't expect to find the perfect game, because after all, what game is perfect?

Here it is, this review was made on 26/07/201, maybe I'll modify it if I see some progress.

EDIT 31/03/2022 :  Unfortunately, no improvement has been seen in game...

遊戲不錯，但就我個人來說希望角色的平衡可以做得更好，以及推出新的模式，畢竟喜歡玩鬼的玩家就只能邊緣單排。

2021/12/29：我玩完一場逃脫後想回去觀戰看看其他人有沒有成功逃出，結果一個「與主機伺服器斷開」我就卡在結算畫面但是沒有結算視窗，然後連離開的按鈕也不見了，怎麼?現在是想強迫不讓我離開遊戲是吧?這還不要緊，我最受不了的是為什麼我玩殺手的時候明明才銅牌或鐵牌結果還能讓我排到紅牌的人類(鐵->銅->銀->金->紅)......你這配對真的沒問題嗎?而且我玩殺手配對幾乎三十秒內就能排到，但是玩人類的時候至少要兩分鐘才排的到，現在是沒人想玩殺手了嗎?也是啦畢竟人類修機速度也太快了，現在遇到的殺手十個裡面有兩個是掛機，兩個是菜雞，兩個是不想殺人的，剩下的四個才是能正常對決的殺手。求你不要讓我覺得買了遊戲+DLC的自己是大傻逼好嗎

真的挺喜欢这个游戏的，每周最快乐的事，就是等朋友下班，一起玩。
但是开挂的人是真的烦人，搞不懂玩这都要开挂得多无聊，经常匹配到卖外挂的人，能不能把这种人封号。难道输赢和段位就真的这么重要吗？开挂赢了也会快乐了吗？

我爱的是游戏本身还有和朋友之间配合沟通的快乐，输赢并不重要，但也不希望外挂玩家影响我们的游戏体验。
说实话，这款游戏下了删删了下。当初17年的时候刚出这个游戏很有新鲜感，看别人玩自己也想试试，但那时候没条件。现在有了，但当初那种感觉找不到了。游戏是款好游戏，可以说是非对称类比较早期的了。

生きているのが嫌になった人にオススメ！

あなたがやることは霧の森で発電機を直す簡単なお仕事です。
4人で直したらゲートと呼ばれる出口から会場から出ましょう。
他の同志が退場して最期の1人になって発電機が直らなくてもハッチと呼ばれる出口があるので最後の1人になってしまったらハッチを探しましょう。
退場させられても大丈夫。何度でも霧の森で発電機はあなたを待っていますよ。


嫌な事が続いて誰でもいいから八つ当たりしたい人にオススメ！

発電機を直している4人を手段を選ばず妨害しましょう。
あらゆる肉体言語とさまざまな手段で八つ当たりが出来ます。
おっと、この楽しい時間を延長させるために4人がそれぞれ直している発電機を蹴り妨害する事も忘れずに。
八つ当たりの度が過ぎて張り倒してしまったら、その人を精肉場にあるフックのようなものに吊るして自慢しましょう。
きっと他のプレイヤー達もあなたの行動に驚いてくれますよ。
5台の発電機を直されてしまったらゲートへ行って更に追い込みましょう。
全員が退場してしまっても気が晴れませんか？
大丈夫、霧の森はあなたを常に必要としています。
这游戏的匹配机制很糟糕，经常匹配双方段位差距过大的局，我不知道是因为没人玩了么，虽然我也不玩了。
